title: Stephen Ray: Abraham Revealing the Historical Roots of our Faith
description:
Stephen Ray emphasizes that unless we understand the innate Ã¢â‚¬Å“JewishnessÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ of Christianity and our Old Testament heritage, we will never fully understand our Faith, the Church, or even salvation itself. These are rooted not only in the early Church, but 2000 years before that, in Abraham. With his infectious enthusiasm, Stephen helps us to learn the deep truths of scripture that God taught through Abraham.
